divs: Sighting DetailsI have a trail cam that takes pictures of any motion. When I checked my computer this picture was taken by the camera. The object appears to be hovering above the ground based on the shadow.The white block in the background sitting on a stump is a salt block for the deer to lick. I then went to the area of the picture and looked for evidence. I didn't see any markings or anything that would explain the object to be anything other than a UFO. I would appreciate some feedback and thoughts pertaining to this photograph.
Summary: Trail Cam took picture of bright blue object hovering above the ground.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Grant
This sighting has never been favorited.
